column1: Little Goat Diner////I have Celiac disease
column2: so I am always looking out for gluten free brunch. They have sourdough pancakes
column4: but the pancakes were burnt. The hash browns were salty
column5: I have had better hash browns. But they have a vast menu and my friend ordered Paratha Burrito
column6: which he said was great. Overall a good experience. But
column7: if going on weekend plan almost hour before because there is a long queue. Enjoy!
